Package org.multiverse.stms.alpha

Interface Summary
AlphaAtomicObject This is the interface placed on the POJO's that want to participate in the alpha STM.
AlphaTransaction A Transaction interface tailored for the Alpha STM.
 

Class Summary
AlphaStm Default Stm implementation that provides the most complete set of features.
AlphaStmConfig An Object responsible for storing the configuration for an AlphaStm.
AlphaStmUtils  
AlphaTranlocal The Tranlocal is the Transaction local content of a AtomicObject, since the state from the AtomicObject is removed.
AlphaTranlocalSnapshot A snapshot of a AlphaTranlocal.
LoggingReadonlyAlphaTransaction  
LoggingUpdateAlphaTransaction  
ReadonlyAlphaTransaction A readonly Transaction implementation.
UpdateAlphaTransaction A Transaction implementation that is used to do updates.
 

Enum Summary
DirtinessStatus A AlphaTranlocal can have different 'dirtiness' states.
